name: 陳紅章
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意
本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。
1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念
2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式
3. 形狀函數及等參數元素
4. 一維問題：桿、桁架、樑及骨架等
5. 二維問題：平面應力應變及板殼問題。
6. 三維問題：一般實體
7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理
8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用
9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.
1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis
2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles
3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements
4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.
5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.
6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids
7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer
8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems
9. Survey of some finite-element software systems
schedule:
Weeks 1-2: Introduction to Finite Element Analysis (FEA)
Overview of FEA
Applications of FEA
Introduction to MATLAB for FEA

Weeks 3-4: Mathematical Foundation for FEA
Review of linear algebra concepts
Introduction to partial differential equations (PDEs)
Basics of numerical methods

Weeks 5-6: Structural Analysis with FEA
One-dimensional (1D) elements and problems
Two-dimensional (2D) elements and problems
Introduction to structural mechanics

Weeks 7-8: Mesh Generation and Preprocessing
Basics of mesh generation
Mesh quality and refinement
Introduction to preprocessing in FEA

Weeks 9-10: MATLAB Programming for FEA
Basics of MATLAB programming
Solving linear algebraic equations in MATLAB
Developing FEA code in MATLAB

Weeks 11-12: Heat Transfer Analysis
Introduction to heat transfer problems
Finite element analysis for heat transfer
MATLAB implementation for heat transfer problems

Weeks 13-14: Fluid Dynamics in FEA
Introduction to fluid dynamics problems
Finite element analysis for fluid dynamics
MATLAB implementation for fluid dynamics problems

Weeks 15-16: Nonlinear Analysis
Introduction to nonlinear problems in FEA
Nonlinear material behavior
MATLAB implementation for nonlinear analysis

Weeks 17-18: Project and Review
Final project assignment incorporating various FEA concepts
Review of key concepts
Preparation for final assessments
materials: "Programming the Finite Element Method" by I. M. Smith, D. V. Griffiths
